title: Strangled (film)
text: Strangled (, ) is a 2016 Hungarian <a href="neo-noir">neo-noir</a> <a href="crime%20film">crime film</a> directed by Árpád Sopsits. It stars Zsolt Anger, <a href="M%C3%B3nika%20Balsai">Mónika Balsai</a>, and <a href="Zs%C3%B3fia%20Szamosi">Zsófia Szamosi</a>. The film was adapted from the story of <a href="P%C3%A9ter%20Kov%C3%A1cs%20%28serial%20killer%29">a serial killer</a> in Hungary 1960s, under the rule of the <a href="Social%20Democratic%20Party%20of%20Hungary">communist party</a>.
